directions: Combine your favorite tea and chai spices (the first six ingredients) in a saucepan of filtered water and bring it gently to the boil.
Add the milk, raw sugar and tapioca and continue simmering for twenty minutes, stirring continuously. You could use almond milk to make this recipe dairy free.
When the tapioca turns translucent, serve into bowls for a sweet, spicy, warm treat. You could also serve this as a cold dessert, topped with berries and nuts. Enjoy.
title: Chai Tapioca Pudding
